subject: Brake pedal issue
description_text:
hi, I received the pedals purchased on aliexpress. after testing them other
than the brake being too stiff, I had another problem. When i press brake
and stay to a certain percentage it floats around that value. For example
if I press to 80% brake it will float between 75 and 85% even if I don't
change the force I'm using, how do I solve this issue? Clutch and Throttle
have no issues. I will attach you a screen record of the issue.
